Text:
Hi zibbik! Can you upload anything by Lisa Guyer? Its not that I want her albums that bad but mainly because she is one of the best female vocalists I've ever heard, and I believe she deserves to be heard!
Apart from her work in Avalon by Sully Erna I think she has made two albums here http://discark.com/en/products/view/492/Lisa%20Guyer%20Band%20ft.%20Barry%20Goudreau/Leap%20Of%20Faith and here http://discark.com/en/products/view/230/Lisa%20Guyer%20Band%20ft.%20Barry%20Goudreau/Gypsy%20Girl
